inclusion.criterion: Willing and able to provide written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Male or female >18 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Chronic Hepatitis C based on the judgment of the investigator
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: All women of child-bearing potential who take ribavirin will need to have a negative urine pregnancy test
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Female who is pregnant or breast feeding and HCV treatment requires use of ribavirin
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of Burkitt's Lymphoma, but no prior chemotherapy. They also have a large pericardial effusion which may be related to their lymphoma.
